Member Function Documentation

void FoggyWindowFrameView::DrawControlFrame (  const Control &  control,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the data of a frame described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
model Model describing the data of a frame.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implements ControlFrameView.
